message: Moutaz Shams This might make JS a little bit more enjoyable :)
name: Introducing TypeScript: A language for application-scale JavaScript development (Channel 9)
caption: channel9.msdn.com
description: 3-012 In this session, Anders will introduce TypeScript, a new language and toolset that makes it easier to write cross-platform, application-scale JavaScript. TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript t

data.message: Yes it is less-crazy but I was expecting something different from MS, something like Script# maybe as I told you before. After reading that 2011 Hanselman's article about JS I knew that its not only me who needs that. Personally I won't use TS until it becomes very popular
